Summary: Appeared in same position in sky, triangle shaped, w/lights at each angle of the triangle
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down Randall toward East St. when I saw what appeared to be a airplane ahead of me in the sky. I kept my eye on it as I approached East St. I realized that something didn't seam right, and that it was not moving. As I was driving down the road it looked like a straight row of lights with two blinking lights on each end in the sky. I stopped my car and rolled my window down and starred directly up at this "thing." At that moment I realized that it was not an airplane, and that it had the shape of a triangle with a big white light at each angle of the triangle. There was no sound coming from it either. If I had to guess, I would say that it was about two football fields high, and about the size of a small airplane. I sat there about 30 seconds, when it took off in the direction of Ravenna and I could still see it, but the lights were gone, and there were two blinking lights on each end that were visible. I pulled into the parking lot were I had to drop off my kids, and continued to watch it at a distance, only seeing the two blinking lights. I went in to the building to drop off my kids, and when I came out it was gone. I know that there has to be others that witnessed this, due to the time is occured, and that I was stopped in the middle of the road , and there were cars behind me.
